column1: # Name: Public spending on education, total (% of government expenditure)

# Definition: Public expenditure on education as % of total government expenditure is the total public education expenditure (current and capital) expressed as a percentage of total government expenditure for all sectors in a given financial year.
# Data from the No Ceilings project: http://noceilings.org
# For more about the data, please visit http://noceilings.org/data
